      • clamp

        public static final int clamp(int x,
        int low,
        int high)
        Return min(max(x,low),high). Or in English: clamp the value of x between low and high.
        Parameters:
        x - An int.
        low - The lowest end of the range.
        high - The highest end of the range.
        Returns:
        The value of x "clamped" in the range.

      • interpolate

        public static double interpolate(double x,
                 double y,
                 double t)
        Linear interpolation between two values: computes t*y+(1-t)*x.
        Parameters:
        x - First value.
        y - Second value.
        t - Interpolation constant.
        Returns:
        The interpolated value: t*y+(1-t)*x.
